review: %u25B66x R-CHOP 2/2011-6/3011 (the "O" is Oncovin = Vincristine).%u25B6 { 16x Rituxan 12/2011-4/2014}.%u25B6 {2x Bendamustine/ Rituxan/Rituxan 11/2014-12/2014, myo infarct 12/11/2014}%u25B6 3x CVP (= Cyclophosphamide, Vincristine, Prednisone 4/2015 -5/2015, 3 more due).%u25B6CVP is my 4th cocktail, since 2-1/2 years of maintenance Rituxan still resulted in increased growth in neck/jaw area%u25B6 Day 1- Day 2 Bendamustine-Rituxan/ Rituxan resulted in myocardial infarction a week  after the 2nd cycle; stent placed at L. Circumflex%u25B6 3 cycles after CVP (every 3 weeks for 6 cycles/ infusions), most prominent  tumor reduced to  half. Low-grade queasiness treated initially w/ Ondansetron, changed to Lorazepam. No hair loss. PowerPort
